document.heading: Public Health Laboratory Fee Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-257, the “Public Health Laboratory Fee Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-679, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 2002, and December 3, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-554 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-257 became effective on March 27, 2003.
